channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov for The Times, 16–17 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 15.3–18.8%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 20.1–23.9%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 7.7–10.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3.1–4.9%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.7–1.8%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 5.0–7.2%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 8.7–11.5%
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 21.0–25.0%
  • Change UK (EPP): 6.8–9.3%
